data.eml:eml: The Jordan theropod (Maastrichtian, Montana, U. S. A.) referred to the genus Aublysodon.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume R. E. Molnar, K. Carpenter. (1989): The Jordan theropod (Maastrichtian, Montana, U. S. A.) referred to the genus Aublysodon. Géobios 22 (4), DOI: 10.1016/S0016-6995(89)80098-1, URL: http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0016699589800981
